Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.11572974]HIV-1:inhibition of cell-cell fusion between 293T cells and  HOS-CD4/fusion cells(IC50=5.5±1..5 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The peptide inhibits HIV-1 entry by inhibiting the fusion between virus and cell membrane.

Literature.Title: Design of potent inhibitors of HIV-1 entry from the gp41 N-peptide region.
Literature.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2001 Sep 25;98(20)11187-92.
Literature.Author: Eckert DM, Kim PS.
